plot: The year is 1929 and the Stock Market has just crashed. The story that follows is one of pure dramady. Can a group of former stock market players create a club where fun and entertainment are the means of life?
title: Pauper's Palace
plot_es: The year is 1929 and the Stock Market has just crashed. The story that follows is one of pure dramady. Can a group of former stock market players create a club where fun and entertainment are the means of life?
